project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, with data stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement function to add a new contact
Implement function to search for a contact by name
Implement function to update an existing contact's information
Implement function to delete a contact
Implement function to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement function to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement the main menu for terminal interaction with the user
Write tests for each of the above functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
